title: Labor Day Light Up
itunes:title: Labor Day Light Up
description: Enjoy Labor Day weekend with the Cigar Authority! Sit back, light up and enjoy Dave and Tommy this week as they try the all new Fleur de la Reign MADURO, and also smoke a special cigar from Carlos Fuente Sr in celebration of his 75th Birthday. The boys will also take you deep inside the world of cigars clearing up mis-truths and mis-information corrected by the international Premium Cigar and Pipe Retailer Association. We also take a look at a place you DON'T want to be this Labor Day... the most restrictive place in America (hint: yes, it is in California).
